Question: Genius Holdings Co., Ltd Taiwan Branch CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Genius Holdings Co., Ltd Taiwan Branch

Product 1

- ezOxygen Smart Breath Checker with ultrasound airflow determination technology
- Try Breath Smart Recorder for breathing training with smartphone and PC connectivity
- Innovative ultrasound solutions for digital respiratory health showcased at CES 2024
- Portable spirometer for managing lung training and inspiration function
- Ultrasound wireless technology for smartphone-connected digitized medical devices
- Collaboration with AstraZeneca for "Healthy Lung App" to manage medication and lung function
- Selected as a finalist for the Start-up Stadium pitch competition at the BIO International Convention
- Application of ultrasound wireless technology for digital pulmonary rehabilitation
- Digital Tri-Flow device for respiratory rehabilitation and health care
- Innovative ultrasound and AI technologies for medical devices and digital respiratory health
Summary_cn:
华威控股有限公司台湾分公司

产品1

- 配备超声波气流测定技术的ezOxygen智能呼吸检测仪
- 尝试使用与智能手机和电脑连接的Breath Smart Recorder进行呼吸训练
- 在2024年的国际消费电子展(CES)上展示的数字呼吸健康创新超声解决方案
- 便携式肺功能仪，用于管理肺部训练和吸气功能
- 用于与智能手机连接的数字化医疗设备的超声波无线技术
- 与阿斯利康合作开发“健康肺应用程序”，用于管理药物和肺功能
- 被选为BIO国际大会创业公司演讲比赛"Start-up Stadium"的决赛选手
- 应用超声波无线技术进行数字肺康复
- 用于呼吸康复和医疗护理的数字Tri-Flow设备
- 用于医疗设备和数字呼吸健康的创新超声波和人工智能技术
